titleStmt.title: A proclamation by his Excellency Robert Earle of Essex.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

notesStmt.note: A proclamation by the Earl of Essex commanding all officers and soldiers of his army to repair to their quarters.
Dated at end: Given under my hand and seale at armes this twenty eight day of February, 1643.
Order to print signed: J. Baldwin Secritary to his Excellency.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
